catch
catch
bind.value: 'onExpChange'; { currentGoldValue: math.floor( expToChange / curExchangeRate ), currentExpValue: expToChange}; 'countNeedGold'

bind.name: catch
bind.value: 'checkRestrictions'; { goldToChange: math.min( maxGold, needGoldForCurrentExp, currentGoldValue), expToChange: math.min( maxGold, needGoldForCurrentExp, currentGoldValue) * curExchangeRate}

bind.name: fade
bind.value: (curTotalExp >= curExchangeRate && accountGold > 0); animationTime; {alpha: 0, height: 0}; {alpha: 1, height: 80}; {alpha: 0, height: 0}; 1; (curTotalExp >= curExchangeRate && accountGold > 0) ? animationDelay : 0
